participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Sensitive and introverted, Emily tends to avoid situations that make her uncomfortable.
participant_1.background: i faint at the sight of blood. my dream in life is to work from home. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Energetic and outgoing, Jake enjoys staying fit and socializing at the gym.
participant_2.background: i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly. i have short hair. eating is something i do when i'm bored.
